Technical Support | Multi-lingual | Level 2

Technical Support | Multi-lingual | Level 2

Full Time,  Part Time
Niš (Serbia)
Posted 4 days ago

We need new heroes: Technical Support Representatives Level 2

JEP Heroes is a new company based in Nis (Serbia). We provide technical- and customer services to our clients. To support our new operations we are looking for Support Heroes.

As a Support Hero you will provide technical and customer care services to the customers of our clients.

The target is to ensure excellent service standards and maintain high customer satisfaction.

Our Support Heroes are the heart of our company. Only they can assure our clients are satisfied. And as Heroes they will be treated. – Emile Koolstra (Owner)

Responsibilities

  1. Effectively manage incoming calls, emails and chat requests
  2. Identify and assess customers’ needs to achieve satisfaction
  3. Build sustainable relationships of trust through open and interactive communication
  4. Provide accurate, valid and complete information by using the right methods/tools
  5. Meet personal/team sales targets and call handling quotas
  6. Handle complaints, provide appropriate solutions and alternatives within the time limits and follow up to ensure resolution
  7. Keep records of customer interactions, process customer accounts and file documents
  8. Follow communication procedures, guidelines and policies
  9. Take the extra mile to engage customers

 

Requirements

  1. Proven customer support skills
  2. Programming and technical skills
  3. Proven language skills (English, Swedish, Dutch, German, Italian, Spanish)
  4. Strong phone contact handling skills and active listening
  5. Familiarity with CRM systems and practices
  6. Customer orientation and ability to adapt/respond to different types of characters
  7. Excellent communication and presentation skills
  8. Ability to multi-task, prioritise, and manage time effectively
  9. High school degree

 

What we offer

  1. Become one of the Heroes!
  2. Exciting new work environment, with (if all goes well), good career opportunities
  3. In-house training on the latest technologies out there (For Level 2 employees)
  4. As each client is different, you will always keep learning and the job will vary a lot

 

Interested?

Are you interested in becoming a Support Hero? Send your resume and motivation letter (both in English) to jobs@jep-heroes.com

Job Features

Job CategoryTechnical Support
Language:Multi-lingual
Technical Level:Level 2
Previous Experience RequiredNo

Apply Online

A valid email address is required.
